text: しかし貰ったからには使わないと申し訳がないとえっちらおっちら始めたのであるが、これが中々悪くなかった。 指使いが三味線と少し似通っていたのもあって、数ヵ月もすれば素人にしてはそれなりに聞けるものにはなったのではないだろうかなどと思ってしまう。 ちなみにこれをくれた件の妖怪はぼくの演奏に涙を流して盛大な拍手を送ってくれたので、恐らくは外から聞いてもおかしくはないのだとは思う。
trans: However, since it would have been rude not to use after receiving it, I clumsily began trying it out, and surprisingly, it was not bad at all. The finger movements were somewhat similar to playing the shamisen, so after a few months, I started to think that, for an amateur, I might be producing something decently listenable. Incidentally, the yokai who gave it to me was moved to tears by my performance and gave me a big round of applause, so I assume it did not sound strange to anyone listening from the outside either.
